name.description: The name of the service instance
name.title: Service name

user.description: The user that the service will run as.
user.title: User

service_account.description: The service account for DC/OS service authentication. This is typically left empty to use the default unless service authentication is needed. The value given here is passed as the principal of Mesos framework.

service_account_secret.description: Name of the Secret Store credentials to use for DC/OS service authentication. This should be left empty unless service authentication is needed.
service_account_secret.title: Credential secret name (optional)

virtual_network_name.description: The name of the virtual network to join

virtual_network_plugin_labels.description: Labels to pass to the virtual network plugin. Comma-separated key:value pairs. For example: k_0:v_0,k_1:v_1,...,k_n:v_n

log_level.description: The log level for the DC/OS service.

sleep.description: The sleep duration in seconds before tasks exit.

count.title: Node count
count.description: Number of hivemq pods to run

disk.title: Disk size (MB)
disk.description: hivemq pod persistent disk requirements (in MB)

disk_type.title: Disk type [ROOT, MOUNT]
disk_type.description: Mount volumes require preconfiguration in DC/OS

rlimits.description: POSIX resource limits applied to the pod. Excercise caution when modifying these default values as it can lead to spurious task failures.

rlimit_nofile.description: Specifies RLIMIT_NOFILE, a value one greater than the maximum file descriptor number that can be opened by this process.

soft.description: The  soft  limit  is  the  value that the kernel enforces for the corresponding resource.

hard.description: The  hard  limit  acts as a ceiling for the soft limit.

java_options.description: JAVA_OPTS to pass to the java process

license.description: Add a (base64 encoded) license at startup, leave empty to start in evaluation mode

control_center_user.title: Control Center user
control_center_user.description: User for the control center login

control_center_password.title: Control Center password
control_center_password.description: Password for the control center login

metrics_enabled.title: Push metrics
metrics_enabled.description: Push HiveMQ metrics to the DCOS StatsD agent, for use with e.g. Prometheus on DCOS

metrics_interval.title: Metrics push interval
metrics_interval.description: Metrics push interval (resolution) in seconds for HiveMQ metrics. Note that if you are using Prometheus, you may need to adjust the Prometheus scrape configuration as well in order to get higher resolution

restrictions.description: Restrictions to limit the load on a broker

max_client_id_length.title: Max client id length
max_client_id_length.description: Maximum client id length in bytes

max_connections.title: Max connections
max_connections.description: Maximum total MQTT connections for a single broker

incoming_bandwidth_throttling.title: Incoming bandwidth throttling
incoming_bandwidth_throttling.description: Incoming bandwidth maximum bytes per second

no_connect_idle_timeout.title: CONNECT idle timeout
no_connect_idle_timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds before disconnecting a client which doesn't send a CONNECT packet

limits.description: Limits and toggles for specific protocol features

session_expiry_interval.title: Session expiry interval
session_expiry_interval.description: Duration (in seconds) that has to pass after the client disconnected, before its session expires

max_packet_size.title: Max packet size
max_packet_size.description: The maximum size of any MQTT packet in bytes that will be accepted by the broker

server_receive_maximum.title: Server receive maximum
server_receive_maximum.description: The maximum amount of PUBLISH messages, which have not yet been acknowledged by the broker, each client is allowed to send

keepalive_max.title: Keep alive maximum
keepalive_max.description: The maximum value of the keepAlive field in the CONNECT packet of the client that will be accepted by the broker

keepalive_allow_unlimited.title: Keep alive allow unlimited
keepalive_allow_unlimited.description: Whether or not the broker will accept connections by clients that sent a CONNECT packet with a keepAlive=0 setting

topic_alias_enabled.title: Topic alias enabled
topic_alias_enabled.description: Whether or not the broker will allow MQTT 5 clients to use topic-alias

topic_alias_max_per_client.title: Topic alias max per client
topic_alias_max_per_client.description: Maximum topic aliases a single client can use

subscription_identifier_enabled.title: Subscription identifier
subscription_identifier_enabled.description: Whether or not the broker will allow MQTT 5 clients to use subscription identifiers

wildcard_subscription_enabled.title: Wildcard subscriptions
wildcard_subscription_enabled.description: Whether or not the wildcard subscription feature is enabled on the broker

shared_subscription_enabled.title: Shared subscriptions
shared_subscription_enabled.description: Whether or not the shared subscription feature is enabled on the broker

retained_messages_enabled.title: Retained messages
retained_messages_enabled.description: Whether or not the retained message feature is enabled on the broker

max_qos.title: Max QoS
max_qos.description: Defines the maximum Quality of Service (QoS) level, which may be used in MQTT PUBLISH messages

queued_message_max_queue_size.title: Queued messages max queue size
queued_message_max_queue_size.description: Maximum amount of messages per client that will be stored on the broker

queued_message_strategy.title: Queued messages strategy
queued_message_strategy.description:
Discard strategy when message arrives at the broker and the corresponding clientâ€™s message queue is full.
discard for discarding newly arriving messages. discard-oldest to discard the oldest message in the queue when a new message arrives

allow_empty_client_id.title: Allow empty client id
allow_empty_client_id.description: Allows the use of empty client ids. If this is set to true, HiveMQ automatically generates random client ids, when clientId in the CONNECT packet is empty

payload_format_validation.title: Payload UTF-8 validation
payload_format_validation.description: Enables the UTF-8 validation of UTF-8 PUBLISH payloads

topic_format_validation.title: Topic UTF-8 validation
topic_format_validation.description: Enables the UTF-8 validation of topic names and client ids

allow_request_problem_information.title: Request problem information
allow_request_problem_information.description: Allows the client to request the problem information. If this is set to false, no reason string and user property values will be sent to clients

enable_rbac.title: Enable RBAC extension
enable_rbac.description: Download and install the file RBAC extension on all nodes

rbac_config.title: Configure RBAC file
rbac_config.description: credentials.xml configuration for users and roles

rbac_extension_config.title: Configure RBAC extension configuration
rbac_extension_config.description: extension-config.xml configuration for users and roles
